In England, in the seven days to 06 May, there were 61,705 new confirmed cases (109.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 April, there were 74,203 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (12,498 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 May is 18,639,196 (32,960.5 cases per 100,000 population).
